column2: You can permanently change your Quanzhen School.
The time has come for you to choose which of the disciples of Master Chongyangzi to dedicate your studies. Which one will you choose?
I shall drink from the Eternal Wisdom Springs.
I shall strive to understand the Infinite Void, Wuji.
I shall follow Lady Feng and find tranquilty within.
The time has come for you to choose which of the disciples of Master Chongyangzi to dedicate your studies. Which one will you choose?
I shall visit the dwelling of Wuxia Sages.
I shall walk with Master Yu to the Immortal abodes.
